channel.title: Firemaking Menu Help PLEASE
channel.description: I need help with adding a help menu for firemaking, can someone please take the time to post code(s) for me to add so I can add a firemaking menu.

item.title: Firemaking Menu Help PLEASE
item.dc:creator: @Halo4Ever Halo4Ever
item.description:
@Halo4Ever wrote:

its not working…[br][size=1]Posted at: November 05, 2006, 07:38:47 PM[/size][hr][quote=“bryanc, post:3, topic:22546”]Yes but put writing of what you want to say in the “” (in the middle of them so make sure you have some on both sides and non in the middle… or it wont compile right.

plus you also need a command to make this work… so go to your client.java and ctrl+f (or file>find):

else if (command.startsWith("

you will find one somewhere find the end of that command (right before the next else if) so go to the } and push enter and copu and paste this:

else if (command.startsWith("firemaking")) { firemakinglist(); }
you can change the “firemakeing” (the command) to what ever you want.

enjoy,

~bryanc~[/quote]

kk thanks i got it

Read full topic

item.title: Firemaking Menu Help PLEASE
item.dc:creator: @bryanc Bryanc
item.description:
@bryanc wrote:

Yes but put writing of what you want to say in the “” (in the middle of them so make sure you have some on both sides and non in the middle… or it wont compile right.

plus you also need a command to make this work… so go to your client.java and ctrl+f (or file>find):

else if (command.startsWith("

you will find one somewhere find the end of that command (right before the next else if) so go to the } and push enter and copu and paste this:

else if (command.startsWith("firemaking")) { firemakinglist(); }
you can change the “firemakeing” (the command) to what ever you want.

enjoy,

~bryanc~

Read full topic

sigh first find

public int GetBlockAnim(int id)

under last } (The LAST!) add this…

public void firemakinglist(){ sendFrame126("@ora@Firemaking", 8144); clearQuestInterface(); sendFrame126("", 8145); sendFrame126("", 8147); sendFrame126("", 8148); sendFrame126("", 8149); sendFrame126("", 8150); sendFrame126("", 8151); sendQuestSomething(8143); showInterface(8134); }

compile & run & click on firemaking
